title: Mobile-Based High-Efficiency Mathematical Discussion Strategy Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process for deepening complex mathematical concepts through discussion in a smartphone-only environment, emphasizing applicability to professional practitioners' work.

learning_goals: Learners can apply cognitive load reduction techniques (e.g., scaffolding, filtering) with over 80% accuracy to shorten discussion participation time by 20%
Learners can exchange peer feedback at least three times during mathematical problem-solving processes and correct over 70% of logical errors
Learners improve discussion quality by adhering over 90% to a 5-stage mobile discussion framework: problem presentation → example analysis → solution proposal → feedback → improvement plan drafting

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
